name: sqlite3-wasm-demo-extension
description: This repository takes the sample code from https://github.com/tomayac/sqlite3-wasm-demo/tree/main/public and converts it to run in an MV3 Chrome extension.

scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy-assets && npm run strip-exports
scripts.copy-assets: cp index.html manifest.json dist/ && cp -r jswasm dist/
